primary_fertilizer.name: Urea (46-0-0) + DAP (18-46-0) + MOP (0-0-60)
primary_fertilizer.reason: Recommended based on Optimal nitrogen status (N: 180.0 mg/kg, P: 25.0 mg/kg, K: 150.0 mg/kg)
primary_fertilizer.benefits: Addresses nutrient deficiency in Wheat, promotes healthy growth, and improves yield potential based on soil analysis

secondary_fertilizer.name: No Secondary Fertilizer Required
secondary_fertilizer.reason: Addresses micronutrient deficiencies based on soil analysis for Wheat
secondary_fertilizer.nutrients_provided: Micronutrients from No Secondary Fertilizer Required
secondary_fertilizer.benefits: Improves enzyme activation, enhances disease resistance, promotes better flowering and fruit set, and prevents micronutrient deficiency symptoms

organic_alternatives.name: Vermicompost
organic_alternatives.benefits: Improves soil structure, water retention, and microbial activity; Rich in humus and beneficial microorganisms
organic_alternatives.reason: Improves soil structure for Wheat; Helps reduce soil salinity
organic_alternatives.timing: Apply 3-4 weeks before sowing (considering Wheat cultivation and soil temp: 28.5°C)

organic_alternatives.name: Neem cake
organic_alternatives.benefits: Natural pest repellent, improves nitrogen availability; Slow nitrogen release; Controls soil nematodes
organic_alternatives.reason: Improves soil structure for Wheat; Helps reduce soil salinity
organic_alternatives.timing: Apply 3-4 weeks before sowing (considering Wheat cultivation and soil temp: 28.5°C)

organic_alternatives.name: Compost
organic_alternatives.benefits: Balances soil pH, increases nutrient availability, promotes beneficial microbes; Excellent organic matter source
organic_alternatives.reason: Improves soil structure for Wheat; Helps reduce soil salinity
organic_alternatives.timing: Apply 3-4 weeks before sowing (considering Wheat cultivation and soil temp: 28.5°C)

application_timing.primary_fertilizer: At sowing: Apply on 15 November 2025 (Day 0) | First dose: Apply at Tillering stage on 10 December 2025 (Day 25) | Expert Tip: Split nitrogen: Half at sowing, remaining in 2 doses later | Best Time: Early morning (6-8 AM) or evening (4-6 PM) | Weather: Avoid application on very hot days or just before heavy rain
application_timing.secondary_fertilizer: Recommended: Apply at Crown Root Initiation stage on 25 December 2025 (Day 40) | Alternative: You can also apply at Jointing stage on 14 January 2026 (Day 60) if needed | Application Method: Mix with water for foliar spray or apply to soil and water immediately | Precaution: Don't apply during flowering stage unless specifically recommended
application_timing.organic_options: Best Time: Mix with soil when sowing on 15 November 2025 (Day 0) | Even Better: Apply 7-10 days before sowing for better decomposition | Method: Mix well with soil at 6-8 inch (15-20 cm) depth | After Application: Water lightly to help decomposition | Benefits: Organic matter needs time to break down and release nutrients slowly

_metadata.model_used: ML Stacking Model (Intelligent Fallback - Crop & Soil Specific)
_metadata.note: Organic alternatives selected based on NPK status and crop requirements
